value.title: Meet The AI That’s (Really) Not Stealing Jobs
value.excerpt: Rather than worrying about AI as a generic, uniform risk to jobs, procurement and supply-chain leaders should explore its potential to supercharge jobs.

value.title: Data Reply Achieves AWS Machine Learning Competency Status
value.excerpt: Data Reply, specialized in the design and implementation of advanced analytics and AI-powered data services, announced today that it has achieved Amazon Web Services (AWS) Machine Learning (ML) Competency status.

value.title: Adobe’s new AI experiment syncs your dance moves perfectly to the beat

value.title: Cruise, GM to seek U.S. okay for self-driving vehicle without pedal, steering wheel
value.excerpt: Self-driving car maker Cruise said on Wednesday it and majority shareholder General Motors Co would seek U.S. regulatory approval in coming months to deploy a limited number of Cruise Origin vehicles without steering wheels or pedals.

value.title: Ben-Gurion University Researchers Develop Machine Learning Platform to Streamline Clinical Trials
value.excerpt: Gurion University of the Negev (BGU) have developed a novel platform to streamline clinical trials, lower costs, and increase the efficiency and success rate of the drug or medical device development process.

value.title: MIT seeks to resurrect 'dead' languages with machine learning
value.excerpt: By implementing a new translation system and a bit of detective work, researchers hope to give old indecipherable languages a new voice.

value.title: New AI-powered sensor measures starlight distortion to help discover new planets
value.excerpt: The "photonic wavefront sensor" helps correct the distortion of starlight caused by observing planets through optical telescopes.

value.title: White House Nears New Rules on Artificial Intelligence

value.title: Performing batch fraud predictions using Amazon Fraud Detector, Amazon S3, and AWS Lambda
value.excerpt: Amazon Fraud Detector is a fully managed service that makes it easy to identify potentially fraudulent online activities, such as the creation of fake accounts or online payment fraud. Unlike general-purpose machine learning (ML) packages, Amazon Fraud Detector is designed specifically to detect fraud.
